# TinyMCE Self-Hosted

This directory contains the self-hosted version of TinyMCE (MIT License).

## Installation

This directory is gitignored. To install TinyMCE after cloning:

```bash
# From project root
./scripts/install-tinymce.sh
```

## Version

TinyMCE 6.8.2 (Community/Open Source)

## License

MIT License - No API key required!

## Documentation

https://www.tiny.cloud/docs/tinymce/6/

## Why Self-Hosted?

- ✅ No API key required
- ✅ No external dependencies
- ✅ Privacy-friendly
- ✅ Works offline
- ✅ Safe for open-source projects
- ✅ Faster loading (local assets)
